description: Episode of Series "The Nature of things". Focuses on Peter and Jill de Villiers, two Harvard researchers, and their contention that knowledge of a language is innate in humans and develops as the child matures biologically. Includes interviews with both scientists and highlights their work. Suitable for tertiary/teacher level.
